results.name: For each permutation p of {1,2,...,n} define maxjump(p) = max(p(i) - i); a(n) is sum of maxjumps of all p.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..448
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k=0..n-1} k * A180190(n,k). - _Alois P. Heinz_, Feb 21 2019
results.author: _Emeric Deutsch_
